summary: Completed final verification testing before Hostinger deployment. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all requested features: Settings page has no Régénérer button (shows 'Clé unique' badge), Billing page week navigation works, Commandes page has editable prix field, Leads page has Relancer button for failed leads.
critical_code_review_comments: API key regenerate endpoint correctly removed from backend (returns 404)
Frontend Settings.jsx correctly removed Régénérer button and shows 'Clé unique' badge
Brief generator includes endpoints object with submit_lead, get_form_config, track_lp_visit, track_cta_click, track_form_start
Brief LP includes logos_html and legal_html in scripts object
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features verified and working: 1) API key regenerate endpoint removed (404), 2) Settings page shows 'Clé unique' badge without Régénérer button, 3) Brief Form/LP contain endpoints object, 4) Brief LP contains logos_html and legal_html, 5) Billing week navigation works, 6) Commandes prix field editable, 7) Leads Relancer button works for failed leads

features_tested.details: Settings page shows 'Clé unique' badge, no regenerate button visible
Brief contains endpoints: submit_lead, get_form_config, track_lp_visit, track_cta_click, track_form_start
Brief LP contains same endpoints plus get_lp_forms
Brief LP scripts object contains logos_html
Brief LP scripts object contains legal_html (CGU/Privacy buttons)
'Semaine précédente' and 'Semaine suivante' buttons work, dates update correctly
Prix: input field with € symbol, editable inline for each commande
'Relancer' button visible for failed leads (Échoué status) and Sans CRM leads
API /api/leads?crm_id={uuid} correctly filters leads by CRM
